name: Anopek
description:
This is the retro game you swear already existed - a mashup of genres, mixing shooter and metroidvania elements, with a stylized look right from the consoles of your childhood.

Begin your journey to a dying planet and discover the relics of the past. Reconnect with the ancient mythos, and explore the labyrinthine temple grounds to learn it’s secrets.

Unlock a variety of weapons with unique abilities to aid your exploration, allowing you to delve deeper into the mysteries of the past, and empower yourself with ancient relics.

Seek out and challenge the pantheon of gods to reclaim the lost parts of your soul. Battle horrifying monsters and duel the divine to prove yourself worthy.

Fulfill the ancient prophecy that Anopek has foretold…

Or deny it, and choose your own path.
